archimate:Requirement.name: REQ_BSS_0697
archimate:Requirement.documentation: As a customer, I want to see personalised information in my app based on my location, so that I find the app more useful.

properties.value: Can you list the expected impact based on location? Suggestion of nearest shop in the buy journey or something more? Another is detecting that a customer is at the airport to proactively suggest a roaming bundle. More scenarios to be defined.

properties.key: Applies to Consumer only, Business only, or Both
